turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a Starbucks pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a venti caffe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, to confirm you wanted a venti caffe mocha with 2% and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place your order there, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have placed your order for a venti caffe mocha with 2% and whipped cream to be picked up at 701 montana avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, that's all I need. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and it should be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.
